trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="simpleType" /> element for simple content from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: 將來自 XML 結構描述之簡單內容的 <see langword="simpleType" /> 元素，依全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 的規定表示。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a simple type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別 (Class) 定義簡單類型。

trans-unit.source: Simple types can specify information and constraints for the value of attributes or elements with text-only content.
trans-unit.target: 簡單類型可以指定具有純文字內容之屬性 (Attribute) 或元素值的資訊和條件約束。

trans-unit.source: Simple types are defined by deriving them from existing simple types (built-in data types and derived simple types).
trans-unit.target: 簡單型別是從現有簡單型別 (內建資料型別和衍生簡單型別) 衍生而定義的。

trans-unit.source: A simple type cannot contain elements and cannot have attributes.
trans-unit.target: 簡單型別不能包含項目，也不能有屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the `XmlSchemaSimpleType` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用`XmlSchemaSimpleType`類別。

trans-unit.source: The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 上述程式碼範例，會產生下列 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets one of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeUnion" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList" />, or <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeUnion" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction" /> 之一。

trans-unit.source: One of <see langword="XmlSchemaSimpleTypeUnion" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList" />, or <see langword="XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlSchemaSimpleTypeUnion" />、<see langword="XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList" /> 或 <see langword="XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction" /> 之一。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the ways in which simple types can be defined.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示可以在其中定義簡單類型的方式。

trans-unit.source: Restricts the range of values for the simple type to a subset of those for the inherited simple type.
trans-unit.target: 簡單類型的值範圍限制的繼承簡單型別子集。

trans-unit.source: Defines a simple type that contains a white space-separated list of values of an inherited simple type.
trans-unit.target: 定義包含泛空白字元分隔之繼承簡單型別值清單的簡單型別。

trans-unit.source: Defines a simple type that contains a union of the values of two or more inherited simple types.
trans-unit.target: 定義包含兩個或多個繼承簡單型別值之聯集的簡單型別。
